IP_PART25_4_syn_1:
EBUS-TBNA.
- Stations 7, 4R, 10L, 11R sampled.
- Indication: Lymphoma staging.
- Sample adequacy confirmed.
IP_PART25_4_syn_2: Evaluation of mediastinal and hilar lymphadenopathy was conducted via EBUS-TBNA. Systematic sampling of stations 7, 4R, 10L, and 11R was performed to rule out lymphoma.
IP_PART25_4_syn_3: Bill 31653: EBUS sampling of 3 or more stations (7, 4R, 10L, 11R). Procedure indicated for lymphadenopathy concerning for lymphoma.
IP_PART25_4_syn_4:
Steps:
1. EBUS scope passed.
2. Nodes visualized.
3. TBNA of 7, 4R, 10L, 11R.
4. Slides prepared.
5. Scope removed.
IP_PART25_4_syn_5: ebus for lymphoma check sampled 7 4r 10l and 11r nodes looked big got good samples sent for path.
IP_PART25_4_syn_6: EBUS-TBNA with sampling of stations 7, 4R, 10L, and 11R was performed for mediastinal and hilar lymphadenopathy concerning for lymphoma.
IP_PART25_4_syn_7:
[Indication]

General.

IP_PART25_4_syn_8: We performed an EBUS-TBNA to investigate mediastinal and hilar lymphadenopathy concerning for lymphoma. We sampled stations 7, 4R, 10L, and 11R.
IP_PART25_4_syn_9: Endobronchial ultrasound with needle aspiration was performed on stations 7, 4R, 10L, and 11R for lymphoma evaluation.
